title: 4 Shifts to Revitalize a Church
itunes:title: 4 Shifts to Revitalize a Church
description: Plateaued. Declining. Stuck. Church revitalization isn't easy. In this episode, Tony and Amy share four shifts your church can make now to lead it towards growth and health in the future.
content:encoded: Plateaued. Declining. Stuck. Church revitalization isn't easy. In this episode, Tony and Amy share four shifts your church can make now to lead it towards growth and health in the future.
itunes:subtitle: Refocusing Your Approach to Ministry
itunes:author: Tony Morgan
